âœ¨ New Features

â€¢ Focus Mode
Added "DEEP WORK" mode. Activates a high-priority block during specific schedules, allowing only a strict whitelist of apps (e.g., Tools) defined in a Package Set.

â€¢ Sleep Mode Enhancements
- Exemptions: You can now allow specific apps (like Alarms or Meditation apps) during Sleep Mode using "IGNORE_SLEEP_MODE".
- Double Tap to Sleep: Quickly turn off the screen by double-tapping the background during Sleep or Focus modes.
- Wrap Up: A one-time 5-minute emergency extension to finish tasks before bed.

â€¢ Package Copier Tool
New utility to easily copy package names for your config. Includes quick buttons for "Current Launcher", "Device Settings", and "System UI".

â€¢ Learn Config
Built-in documentation screen explaining all CONFIG.SYS commands and syntax.

â€¢ Package Sets
Define groups of apps (PKGSET) to reuse across different rules and modes.
